chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Red5 is an Open Source Flash Server written in Java that supports:

listitem.para: Recording Client Streams (FLV and AVC+AAC in FLV container)
Protocols: RTMP, RTMPT, RTMPS, and RTMPE

chapter.para: For the current release information goto the Releases page at red5.org.
Lastly the documentation is under development at the moment. If you have unanswered questions after using it, please check out our mailing list

section.title: 1.0 Public Release
section.para: More stable version for production environment. This public release has many more features and so the focus should be on testing and bug reports.

listitem.para: Added vod and live application samples
Added dynamic streaming and play2 support
JMX overhauled to utilize built-in Spring objects
Modified bandwidth handling to more acurately follow what FMS does
Modifications to support Wirecast and other broadcast clients that don't use the same publish request that FlashPlayer uses
